statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -12 \\ 8 \\ 13 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -12 \\ -30 \\ 14 \\ 34 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
